#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
            int a[]={1,2,3,4,5};
            int j;
            //Block 1 starts here
                int *x;
                x=a;
                for(j=5;j>0;j--)
                {
                        cout<<*x;
                        x++;
                }
return 0;
 
//Block 1 ends here
 
}
